chunk:
Sodashi Calming Rose Face Mist

Brand: Sodashi

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: aqua (purified water), rosa damascena (damask rose floral water), prunus dulcis (almond oil polyglycerol), alcohol (ethanol, pure cane spirit), tocopherol (vitamin E), citrus grandis (grapefruit seed extract)
Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
